column1: What is the scientific study of life called?
column2: a: Chemistry | b: Biology | c: Physics | d: Geology

column1: Which theme in biology explains the unity and diversity of life?
column2: a: Evolution | b: Energy processing | c: Cellular structure | d: Genetic coding

column1: What allows organisms to move, grow, and reproduce?
column2: a: Photosynthesis | b: Energy processing | c: Cell division | d: Respiration

column1: What is the process by which biologists make observations, pose questions, and form conclusions?
column2: a: Hypothesis testing | b: Scientific method | c: Data analysis | d: Experimental design
